TopicTitle: How to get to the mun using mech jeb?

Articles.Content: Basically, my last landing done by me, left the guys on the mun, i am bringing a vessel with a spare Capacity for them, but how do i get to the mun using mech jeb? I am in orbit, but i dont know how to get to the mun, the Rendezvous just isnt working, i am still orbiting kerbin D:
Isn't there a 'descent procedure' there? Rendezvous is for orbit AFAIK.
i do it and i completely miss it

Ok, so if you want a step-by-step guide heres how you do it.

1. Make kerbin orbit

2. Go to orbital operations and click TRANS and then transfer to mun

3. once its done, wait until you are your desired orbit altitude above the mun

4. then in orbital operations go to CIRC and click circularize

5. now click landing autopilot

6. now choose the target by clicking select target on map

7. now click land on target

8. now (thats alot of ''nows'') just wait and it will (try) to land at your desired location

9. done!
